description.brief: A wrapper for rclcpp_lifecycle::LifecycleNode to simplify application composition through unified component interfaces while supporting lifecycle states and transitions.
description.details: This class is intended for direct inheritance to implement custom state-based components that perform different behaviors based on their state and on state transitions.

parameters.description: The frequency in Hertz for all periodic callbacks (this parameter overrides the period parameter)
The time interval in seconds for all periodic callbacks

predicates.description: True if the component is in error state
True if the component is in an unconfigured state, either through construction or cleanup transition
True if the component is in an inactive state, either through the configuration or deactivation transition
True if the component is in an active state, executing the step function periodically
True if component is in a finalized state, either through the shutdown or error transition
